attributes.action: stop blaming the previous Government, who have now been out of power for over 10 years, for everything that goes wrong.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every time a member of the Government stands up and gives a speech they too often  include a variation of the phrase "The last Government failed" or "In the period 1979 to 1997...".  

This used to be valid and remained so up till about 2001.  It now merely sounds like an unsubtle attempt to score childish points against a party whose leadership now has little or no members of the then Government.

Please can we start having intelligent, sensible and informed debates rather than childish, name calling, playground brawls in what is supposed to be the seat of one of the oldest democracies in the World.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
